setProperty(String, String) - クラス のメソッドnlp4j.deeplearnig.Word2VecIndexer
set property of this class "target" : field name of document "outfile" : out file of model file "document_tokenized": document is tokenized already: true | false parameters int batch_size = 1000; int min_word_frequency = 5; boolean use_ada_grad = false; int layer_size = 150; int iterations = 5; long seed = 1; int window_size = 5; double learning_rate = 0.025; double min_learning_rate = 1e-3; double negative_sample = 10; int num_workers = 6;
